DOC.brief_summary: This multicentre , prospective , randomize , open-label study compare safety efficacy mycophenolate mofetil delay introduction sirolimus discontinuation cyclosporine , mycophenolate mofetil long term continuation cyclosporine renal transplant recipient receive daclizumab ( Zenapax ) induction treatment follow 8 month treatment corticosteroid . The anticipated time study treatment 12 month . Participants complete initial 12-month study provide write informed consent eligible participate 60-month follow-up phase .
